name: Mega Lopunny - Pokemon
description:
I handpicked the training set so that I exclude fanart with extreme proportions / too much human features.

So this LoRA should give a pretty accurate mega Lopunny.

I decided to dedicate this LoRA only to the mega version because the base form is popular enough, I guess that it could be generated even without a LoRA.

Trigger word is just megalopunny. No need to specify the base features like pink eyes, animal ears, brown fur, black sclera.

modelVersions.name: megalopunny-000016 v1.0
modelVersions.description: Trained on NAI. 5 repeats 16 epochs. Training dataset 38 images, all credits and signatures removed.
